name: The Artificial Intelligence Project
description:
The Artificial Intelligence has just arrived on your mobile phone!

Ready to have the most interesting conversations you ever imagined? This simulation uses AIML technology (Artificial Intelligence Markup Language) to create natural language conversations.

Based on A.L.I.C.E. (Artificial Linguistic Internet Computer Entity), created by Richard Wallace, it is a 3 times winner of the Annual Loebner Prize Competition in Artificial Intelligence, and also the Chatterbox Challenge Champion in 2004.

Implements the Natural Language Processing Capability developed in 1966 by the MIT Artificial Intelligence Laboratory and implemented in ELIZA, regarded as one of the first programs capable of passing the Turing test.

Here is what you can expect from this app in future updates:

- Character customization and animations

-Voice recognition and speech

-Translations to many other languages

-Personality behavior and moods

Enjoy!
